meanings.definition: The system of social networks and influential relationships that facilitate business and other dealings.
meanings.sent1: In China, having good guanxi can help you succeed in business.
meanings.sent2: She relied on her guanxi to secure a job at the company.
meanings.sent3: His guanxi was so strong that he could get discounts everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her guanxi acted like a key that unlocked many opportunities.
meanings.sent5: Building guanxi is like planting seeds for future success.

meanings.definition: Personal connections and relationships that are used to gain advantage or favors.
meanings.sent1: He used his guanxi to get VIP tickets to the concert.
meanings.sent2: Their guanxi with the mayor helped them get the project approved.
meanings.sent3: Their guanxi was so tight, they always got the best deals.
meanings.sent4: Her guanxi was like a treasure chest full of favors.
meanings.sent5: Good guanxi is like having a secret weapon in business.
